title: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: Bug 50793: When a ServletRequestListener is defined, the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST rather than ASYNC after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().
OB: The expected behavior is for the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest to be ASYNC after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().
EB: The actual behavior is that the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().
SR: To resolve this issue, the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() should be corrected to ASYNC.
